info.title: MixerAPI Demo (Public API)
info.description:
Check out [MixerAPI.com](https://mixerapi.com) to streamline your API development.

You can view the source code for this [demo here](https://github.com/mixerapi/demo).

If you are viewing this on demo.mixerapi.com then the database resets every 24 hours.

Browse the [JSON-LD vocabulary](/public/vocab) for this API.

Go back to the [homepage](/).

get.description: Returns a collection of the actor's films.
List a sum count of films by category using a MySQL View.

List a sum count of films by rating. This example demonstrates creating a report referencing an adhoc openapi
schema `#/x-mixerapi-demo/components/schemas/FilmByRating`
Returns a collection of the film's actors
